movie.title: We Are One
movie.description_intro: Activists around the world fight injustice and drive social change in this documentary that follows their participation in the music video Solidarité.
movie.description_full: Activists around the world fight injustice and drive social change in this documentary that follows their participation in the music video Solidarité.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.summary: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment, the fate of Earth and existence has never been more uncertain.
movies.description_full: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment, the fate of Earth and existence has never been more uncertain.

movies.title: The Counselor
movies.summary: A rich and successful lawyer, the Counselor, is about to get married to his fiancée but soon becomes entangled in a complex drug plot with a middle-man known as Westray. The plan ends up taking a horrible twist and he must protect himself and his soon to be bride as the truth of the drug business is uncovered and targets are eliminated.

movies.title: Cannonball Run II
movies.summary: The Sheik who competed at the last Cannonball Run, is berated by his father for not winning it. So he tells him to go and win. Problem is that there is no Cannonball Run. So his father tells him to make one of his own. He puts up a million dollars as the prize. So former Cannonballers J.J. and his buddy Vince join, as does Blake and Fenderbaum and some other characters. But Blake and Fenderbaum owe a mobster some money, and the mobster owes some other guy more. He then decides to grab the Sheik and hold him for ransom so he can pay the guy back.

movies.title: The Tigger Movie
movies.summary: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.
movies.description_full: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.
